languages.text: "{name}, я..." {n}Былые гордость и спесь Ирлиэт сменились неловкостью и смятением.{/n} "Впервые мне приходится вот так объясняться. Но ты... заслуживаешь правды, как никто другой".

"{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."
languages.original_text: "{name}, я..." {n}Былые гордость и спесь Ирлиэт сменились неловкостью и смятением.{/n} "Впервые мне приходится вот так объясняться. Но ты... заслуживаешь правды, как никто другой".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is the first time that I have to explain myself like this.But you... deserve to know the truth like nobody else."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，我……”{n}伊莉耶特不复往日的高傲自大，反而有些困惑与尴尬。{/n}“这是我第一次如此为自己辩解，但我认为你……比任何人……都应该知道真相。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，我……”{n}伊莉耶特不复往日的高傲自大，反而有些困惑与尴尬。{/n}“这是我第一次如此为自己辩解，但我认为你……比任何人……都应该知道真相。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, yo...». {n}El orgullo y la altivez habituales de Yrliet dan paso a la confusión y la vergüenza.{/n} «Es la primera vez en mi vida que me veo obligada a dar esta clase de explicaciones. Pero tú... más que nadie... mereces saber la verdad».
languages.original_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, yo...». {n}El orgullo y la altivez habituales de Yrliet dan paso a la confusión y la vergüenza.{/n} «Es la primera vez en mi vida que me veo obligada a dar esta clase de explicaciones. Pero tú... más que nadie... mereces saber la verdad».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, je... » {n}La fierté et le dédain affichés habituellement par Yrliet semblent avoir laissé place à la gêne et à la confusion.{/n} « C'est la première fois que je dois expliquer mes actes ainsi, mais vous... plus que quiconque... méritez de connaître la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, je... » {n}La fierté et le dédain affichés habituellement par Yrliet semblent avoir laissé place à la gêne et à la confusion.{/n} « C'est la première fois que je dois expliquer mes actes ainsi, mais vous... plus que quiconque... méritez de connaître la vérité. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, ich ..." {n}Yrliets sonstiger Hochmut und ihre Arroganz machen Verlegenheit und Verwirrung Platz.{/n} "Das ist das erste Mal, dass ich mich in dieser Form erklären muss. Aber Ihr verdient ... mehr als {mf|jeder|jede} andere ... die Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, ich ..." {n}Yrliets sonstiger Hochmut und ihre Arroganz machen Verlegenheit und Verwirrung Platz.{/n} "Das ist das erste Mal, dass ich mich in dieser Form erklären muss. Aber Ihr verdient ... mehr als {mf|jeder|jede} andere ... die Wahrheit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}よ、我は…」{n}ユリエットのいつものプライドと傲慢さが、気まずさと戸惑いに変わる。{/n}「こんなふうに自分のことを説明するのは初めてだ。だがお前は…誰よりも…真実を知るに値する」
languages.original_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}よ、我は…」{n}ユリエットのいつものプライドと傲慢さが、気まずさと戸惑いに変わる。{/n}「こんなふうに自分のことを説明するのは初めてだ。だがお前は…誰よりも…真実を知るに値する」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, ben..." {n}Yrliet'in her zamanki gururu ve küstahlığı, yerini tuhaflığa ve şaşkınlığa bırakmış.{/n} "İlk kez kendimi böyle açıklayacağım. Gerçeği bilmeyi herkesten daha çok hak ediyorsun."
languages.original_text: "{name}, I..." {n}Yrliet's usual pride and arrogance give way to awkwardness and confusion.{/n} "This is my first time ever having to explain myself like this. But you... more than anyone... deserve to know the truth."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, ben..." {n}Yrliet'in her zamanki gururu ve küstahlığı, yerini tuhaflığa ve şaşkınlığa bırakmış.{/n} "İlk kez kendimi böyle açıklayacağım. Gerçeği bilmeyi sen herkesten daha çok hak ediyorsun."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
